message.body: Hey, happy Easter. Want to come help Kathy and I field test our Sangria?
Happy Easyer to you too. I feel like we see each other every day on MapMyRun.
I can't tonight but let's get together soon.
Homemade Sangria is hard to pass up!
Ha ha! Yeah, it's pretty good. I took tomorrow off, celebrating Easter in style. Not quite Asian hooker style... But a cleaner conscience!
It's all about the conscience after 21
Yes, yes indeed. But then again, it was just a massage.
Just a special one
We're going to need your help soon with our landscaping and fencing needs.
No problem
Any chance you want to run Broad Street? Kathy and I have a wedding to go to and need to sell our bibs.
How much ?
I could do it... I think
$40 each is the registration cost. Got a running partner? Cuz we've got to spots.
Sure you could do it.
I figured. Yeah I'll buy them
*two no to
Both or just one? There is an official registration switch process (so the actual person running gets the actual credit).
Ok, definitely one for me. I'll have to get back to you on the second.
Sounds good. We need to know by April 19 for the other. Got plans for next weekend?
Only to ride my bike one of the days.
Getting back into the climbing too. Bouldered couple times last week
Yeah, I've seen Layton and Kuehler climbing lately too. Let us know what night works better, Friday or Saturday and we will make plans. It's warming up and we want to start grilling again.
Will do for sure
